Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its high value and quality, I believe it's worth more than what others are willing to pay. Considering its true worth and your potential interest, I propose a special offer for you. For a limited time, you can purchase this exceptional item for $120. This is an exclusive opportunity tailored just for you, leveraging our direct connection. Don't miss out on this chance to own something truly remarkable at a fantastic price. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
